CustomField.description: Field to Translate the Payment Batch Record Name
CustomField.formula: CASE(Name , "Aftersales 100% Final invoice", "100% Loppulasku", "50% Advance","50%", "25% Advance","25%", "50% Consumer","50%", "50% Financing", "50% Rahoitus", "Consumer Financing","Kuluttaja Rahoitus", Name) & " " & CASE(TEXT(Type__c) , "Deposit","ennakkomaksu", "Payment","ennakkomaksu kun sopimus on tehty", "Final Invoice","loppumaksu asennuksen j채lkeen", TEXT(Type__c)) & " 7 p채iv채채 netto."
CustomField.label: Batch Name Localized
